thread.title: In a Shift, Islamic State Tries to Show It Can Govern
thread.title_full: In a Shift, Islamic State Tries to Show It Can Govern - WSJ

author: Margaret Coker
title: In a Shift, Islamic State Tries to Show It Can Govern
text:
In a bustling Iraqi city, road crews fill potholes, while hundreds of miles away in Syria administrators prepare for the new school year and bureaucrats implement a new crop-watering regimen.
Welcome to a week in Islamic Stateâ€”or at least the vision of the state the terrorist group wants to portray to Muslims skeptical of its self-ascribed authority.
Last year, Islamic State stormed to prominence with its ruthless military...
